name: Aliens (TC) 2017
description:
Kontra Kommando Presents Aliens (TC) By Justin Fisher. A remake of the classic 1994 Aliens-themed, Doom-mod.

 - A graphically overhauled and expanded version of the Warrior Xenomorph, along with a more advanced and deadly AI. As well as a multitude of new death-states.
 - Weapons and items included from Aliens: The Ultimate Doom.
 - Slight-randomization of items and weapons, while not deviating too far from the original layout.
